sentences.en: Cecilia Cheung refers to someone dishonest, unreliable, causing distress to the actress.
sentences.cn: 张柏芝指有人不老实, 不可靠, 对女星造成困扰.

sentences.en: Diplomats can be a notoriously unreliable and misleading source of information.
sentences.cn: 外交官可能会提供一些靠不住的误导性信息，这是众所周知的。

sentences.en: For the present, therefore, we must reject any conclusion drawn from such completely unreliable reports.
sentences.cn: 因此,凡根据这样绝对不可靠的报告而作的任何结论, 我们都必须加以屏弃.
他有辆性能不稳定的车。

sentences.en: Her old car was unreliable, so the trip was plagued by breakdowns.
sentences.cn: 她的旧车老不听使唤，一路上总是出故障。

sentences.en: In many industrial countries, figures on farmers'incomes are unreliable or unavailable.
sentences.cn: 在许多工业国中, 关于农民收入的数据或是不可靠或是不可得的.

sentences.en: Mechanical switching is inherently slow and frequently unreliable.
sentences.cn: 机械开关速度有一种固有的缓慢性,而且经常不可靠.

sentences.en: She was totally unreliable, so she got / was given her marching orders.
sentences.cn: 她完全不可靠, 所以给解雇了.

sentences.en: Supplies of everything are unreliable, food is short.
sentences.cn: 各种补给都不稳定，食品也短缺。
这辆汽车的性能变得非常不稳定。

sentences.en: The effect of colinearity is to make the regression coefficients unreliable.
sentences.cn: 共线性的影响是使回归系数不可靠.
火车不准点是出了名的。

sentences.en: They are two of a kind and totally unreliable.
sentences.cn: 他俩是同类货色,都是不可靠的人.

sentences.en: This fellow is always chopping and changing ; he's very unreliable.
sentences.cn: 这个人反复无常, 很不可靠.

sentences.en: We shopkeepers hear so muchbut all of it is unreliable gossip.
sentences.cn: 我们生意人听到的事很多--但都是没根没据的闲话.

words.tran_cn: 不可靠，不可信赖；不安全

trans.tran_cn: 不可靠的，靠不住的，不能信任的
trans.tran_en: unable to be trusted or depended on
